00018 #ifndef BC_H
00019 #define BC_H
00020 
00021 
00022 /*
00023 type==1 essential (dof):
00024 
00025 value=UN_CONSTRINED that dof is not constriend
00026 value=number the dof is constrined to number
00027 
00028 type==2 natural (force)
00029 value[0]=x-component of the load vector
00030 value[1]=y-component of the load vector
00031 
00032 type==3 both
00033 
00034 value [4]       [2]             [2]
00035       side   0-natural        0-x dir.
00036             1-essential       1-y dir.
00037 
00038 */
00039 
00040 
00042 struct BC
00043 {
00044   int type[4];
00045   float value[4][2][2]; 
00046 
00048   BC()
00049     {
00050       type[0] = 0;
00051       type[1] = 0;
00052       type[2] = 0;
00053       type[3] = 0;
00054       for(int i=0;i<4;i++)
00055         for(int j = 0; j<2; j++) 
00056           for(int k=0; k<2; k++)
00057             value[i][j][k] = 0.0;
00058     }
00059 };
00060 #endif
